# Part 1

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
library(glue)
library(magrittr)
library(readr)
library(stringr)
```

```{r}
raw_input <-
  readr::read_table("puzzle-input.txt", col_names = "input")
```

```{r}
example <- tibble::tibble(input = "13-16 k: kkkkkgmkbvkkrskhd")

clean_data <- function(raw_input) {
  return(
    raw_input %>%
      tidyr::separate(input, into = c("reqs", "password"), sep = ":") %>%
      tidyr::separate(
        reqs,
        into = c("limits", "req_letter"),
        sep = " "
      ) %>%
      tidyr::separate(
        limits,
        into = c("lower_lim", "upper_lim"),
        sep = "-"
      ) %>%
      dplyr::mutate(
        lower_limit = as.numeric(lower_lim),
        upper_limit = as.numeric(upper_lim)
      ) %>%
      dplyr::select(lower_limit, upper_limit, req_letter, password)
  )
}

input <- clean_data(raw_input)

check_password <-
  function(password,
           req_letter,
           lower_limit,
           upper_limit) {
    output <- FALSE
    for (i in lower_limit:upper_limit) {
      pattern = rep(req_letter, i) %>% glue::glue_collapse()
      output <-
        dplyr::if_else(stringr::str_detect(password, pattern),
                       TRUE,
                       FALSE)
      return(output)
    }
  }

check_password("bbccccc", "c", , 50)
```

# Part 2

```{r}
input <-
  readr::read_table("puzzle-input.txt", col_names = "input")[[1]]
input_size <- length(input)
print(input)

for (i in input) {
  for (j in input) {
    for (k in input) {
      sum <- i + j + k
      if (sum == 2020) {
        print(i * j * k)
      }
    }
  }
}
```
